name: Crab Salad With Cilantro, Tarragon and Grapefruit
keywords: appetizer, cilantro, lump crab meat, dairy-free, gluten-free, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons apricot kernel oil or almond oil or a neutral-tasting oil like grapeseed
1/2 teaspoon sansho pepper (available at Japanese markets) or 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground green or black peppercorns
Freshly grated zest of 1/2 pink grapefruit

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, gently combine all ingredients. Taste and add more oil, pepper or grapefruit zest to bring flavors into balance. Keep chilled until ready to serve.
